Life Solina - The Royal Archives of Aden:
After this incident, Solin has promised to dedicate his life Einhasad to humble service to earn redemption and the father of the imperial household. But sincere prayer young Solina not soften the heart of the angry bognini. For the great goddess Baium sins taken away from his daughter's eyes, and only then to pacify the anger. Solina meekly accepted the punishment and continued to serve the goddess, carrying the burden of the sins of the imperial semt. Solin led a modest life recluse, stoically enduring hardship. Her kindness and compassion throughout her glorified Elmoredenu whose inhabitants worshiped as a saint Solin.
